title: How Violence is Shaping the Midterms
description:
With one week to go before the midterms, the U.S. finds itself teetering on a knife's edge. David Meyers speaks to Bloomberg News politics reporter Anna Edgerton on how a recent string of political violence that has shocked the nation will impact the November election. 
FOLLOW UP
 Anna's latest report: Political Violence Heightens Divisions in Trump's First Midterms
You can follow Anna at: @annaedge4
----
 TicToc is a daily news podcast hosted by David Meyers (@davidfmeyers), produced at Bloomberg Worldwide HQ in New York City. You can follow up with us and watch our reporting @tictoc. If you like it, be sure to rate us on iTunes, and tell your friends!
